title: Bloomberg Markets: Facebook to Give Russian Info to Congress
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Facebook to Give Russian Info to Congress
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Max Chafkin\u0010Tech Reporter \u0010Bloomberg Businessweek\u0010Discussing Facebook Inc. saying it will give Congress information on the political ads bought by Russians to sow discord ahead of the U.S. presidential election, and vowed to publicly disclose more details on this marketing in the future.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
